title: Elizabeth Sobinoff her super slim figure in crop top
text:
She's hoping to find love second time around on the upcoming season of Married At First Sight.

And on Monday, Elizabeth Sobinoff, who has shed 10 kilos since leaving the reality series, showed off her tiny figure in an Instagram selfie.

'I'm honestly over here just minding my business, not giving a damn about the bs of the world,' she captioned the photo.

'Not giving a damn about the BS of the world': Elizabeth Sobinoff (pictured) showed off her her super slim figure in a skimpy crop top in an Instagram snap on Monday

Lizzie revealed her toned tummy while wearing a tiny black crop top, floppy sun hat and sunglasses, as she sat on a bed.

The new photo comes after the beauty faced criticism from fans who fear she has become too slim.

Last week, she broke her silence after a photo of her looking remarkably slender sparked concerns for her health.

Slender: Last week, the star broke her silence after this photo of her looking remarkably slim sparked fears for her health

Alongside this picture of herself looking very slender, she wrote: 'In a good head space right now. Hoping everyone has had at least one smile cross their faces today'

The jewellery store manager, who has lost 10kg over the last few months, seemingly addressed her fans' concerns in a post shared to Instagram on Wednesday.

Alongside a picture of herself looking very slender, she wrote: 'In a good head space right now. Hoping everyone has had at least one smile cross their faces today.'

While some fans praised Elizabeth for her positivity, others were still worried about her shrinking figure.

Changes: The jewellery store manager has lost 10kg over the last few months. Pictured left on Married at First Sight earlier this year and right, recently

One of her followers wrote: 'It's time to stop losing weight. You're getting too thin, babe. Whatever floats your boat but you were gorgeous before. Be careful.'

Since appearing on Married At First Sight earlier this year, Elizabeth has completely transformed her appearance.

She has ditched her blonde hair extensions, embracing a more natural brunette shade, and also toned down her makeup.

Speaking about her 10kg weight loss to NW magazine recently, Elizabeth said she loved her body 'at any size'.
description: She's hoping to find love second time around on the upcoming season of Married At First Sight.
authors: Marta Jary For Daily Mail Australia
